what.title: What is PixFlow?
what.description: PixFlow is a professional and free web image editor that works entirely in your browser. No installation, account or registration required. All tools are available offline as a Progressive Web App (PWA).

why.title: Why PixFlow?
points: 100% Private - Your photos never leave your device
No Installation - Works directly in the browser
Completely Free - No subscriptions or hidden fees
Offline First - Install as an app and use without connection

author.title: Author
author.description: PixFlow was created by Bogdan Andrei Faur as an open source project to demonstrate the capabilities of modern web technologies.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: PixFlow is 100% open source under MIT license. Contributions, suggestions and bug reports are welcome.
